title: Body of Reuters Photographer Was Mutilated in Taliban Custody, Officials Say
content:
1. Body of Reuters Photographer Was Mutilated in Taliban Custody, Officials Say  The New York Times
  2. Taliban targets mosque, kills award-winning photojournalist Danish Siddiqui | Latest English News  WION
  3. Questions raised over killing of Reuters photographer Danish Siddiqui in Afghanistan  The Straits Times
  4. Taliban executed photojournalist Danish Siddiqui after verifying his identity: Report  News Live
  5. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ロイター通信の写真家の遺体はタリバンの拘束下で切断されていたと当局が発表
官员称路透社摄影师的尸体在塔利班的关押下被肢解
官員稱路透社攝影師的屍體在塔利班的關押下被肢解
